meanings.definition: The dead body of an animal
meanings.sent1: The hunter found the carcase of the deer in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Vultures gathered around the carcase of the fallen zebra.
meanings.sent3: The scavenger party fought over the carcase, causing a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: The carcase of the old lion lay still, a silent reminder of the circle of life.
meanings.sent5: The stench emanating from the carcase made it impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: The framework or basic structure of a vehicle
meanings.sent1: The car mechanic examined the carcase of the damaged truck.
meanings.sent2: The carcase of the vintage car was carefully restored by the enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The carcase of the car looked like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The carcase of the vehicle held the key to its overall stability.
meanings.sent5: The carcase of the car was sturdy, ensuring the safety of its passengers.
